content: Will there be a pre-connectathon preparation meeting?
We'll be discussing the Bulk Data track at the meeting this afternoon

2ET? Arrr. I have a conflict.
I will attend Bulk data track. Other than the community edition test suite, Inferno also provide ONC program edition test suite with multi-patients query testing. Should I add that to track confluence page?
Thanks - that would be great. Also, I'll update the meeting notes and track wiki with anything that comes out of the discussion today.
